snippet: Gary Gait, a four-time all-American who helped Syracuse win three consecutive N.C.A.A. lacrosse championships, has coached the women’s team to a high tournament seed.
abstract: Gary Gait, a four-time all-American who helped Syracuse win three consecutive NCAA lacrosse championships, has coached the Syracuse women’s team to a high tournament seed.
lead_paragraph: Gary Gait, a four-time all-American who helped Syracuse win three consecutive N.C.A.A. lacrosse championships, has coached the women’s team to a high tournament seed.

headline.seo: N.C.A.A. Lacrosse - Gary Gait Coaches Syracuse Women to 4th Seed
headline.main: Syracuse Lacrosse Legend Has Women’s Team at No. 4
headline.print_headline: Former Men’s Star At Syracuse Builds Women’s Contender
